long_description: Simple and streamlined, the KAVU Chillba hat shades your eyes and face from the sun without weighing you down. The lightweight fabric also packs down small to fit easily in your pack or jacket pocket. Nylon fabric wicks away moisture and dries quickly. KAVU Chillba hat features an adjustable chin cord with toggle lock. Strap patterns vary and the hat may come with a different pattern than pictured.
short_description: Simple and streamlined, the KAVU Chillba hat shades your eyes and face from the sun without weighing you down. The lightweight fabric also packs down small to fit easily in your pack or jacket pocket.
